mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.audit_status AS "auditStatus", a.bank_id AS "bankId", a.lian_dan AS "lianDan", a.store_photo_door_head AS "storePhotoDoorHead", a.store_photo_cashier_desk AS "storePhotoCashierDesk", a.store_photo_environment AS "storePhotoEnvironment", a.additional_photo AS "additionalPhoto", a.finish_status AS "finishStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO erp_store_pay_unionpay( id, audit_status, bank_id, lian_dan, store_photo_door_head, store_photo_cashier_desk, store_photo_environment, additional_photo, finish_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{auditStatus}, #{bankId}, #{lianDan}, #{storePhotoDoorHead}, #{storePhotoCashierDesk}, #{storePhotoEnvironment}, #{additionalPhoto}, #{finishStatus}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.select: SELECT espu.id AS "id", espu.audit_status AS "auditStatus", espu.store_photo_door_head AS "storePhotoDoorHead", espu.store_photo_cashier_desk AS "storePhotoCashierDesk", espu.store_photo_environment As "storePhotoEnvironment" FROM erp_store_info esi LEFT JOIN erp_store_pay_unionpay espu ON esi.unionpay_id = espu.id AND espu.del_flag = '0' WHERE esi.del_flag = '0' and esi.sync_oem = 'N' AND esi.id = #{erpStoreInfoId} AND esi.shop_info_id = #{shopId} AND esi.is_main = #{isMain}
